name: INTVTN_DOC_INFO
description: This table contains information related to documentation on care plan interventions.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the intervention record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONTACT_NOTES_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note filed for the intervention.
